txt.en: Thane Torferth is at Tordag's encampment, north-west of Stoke.\n\nLúfa bade you seek out the aid of young Thane Torferth of Torsbury.
Bring Thane Ordlac's token to Thane Torferth

'[placeholder], I have seen the token in my husband's hands many times...he used to handle it when he was anxious about something. If you found it upon one of the brigands, it can only mean one thing: Ordlac is the traitor for which you had been searching at Oserley...and the one who ordered my death!\n\n'Do not return to Ordlac, [placeholder], for I fear it would be your death. Go instead to Torferth at Torsbury and tell him what transpires. He must bring his garrison to Stoke's defence at once!'
Ordlac sent you to put an end to the treacherous brigands who murdered Reeve Fríthild, but upon returning to Stoke, you found Lúfa, Ordlac's wife, awaiting you at the gate.

'What is this? I know this token well...it was a gift of friendship from my father to Ordlac's. Now all of the pieces of evidence you brought me make sense!\n\n'I should have seen it...Ordlac is the traitor who brought ruin to my people! Lúfa was right to send you to me. I think it likely that Ordlac will soon move against young Reeve Fríthbert. We must return to Stoke and put an end to his treachery!'
